_meanings:
Lasting for a
‘nimisha’ or twinkling, momentary,
transient.

<ab>N.</ab> of a sacred forest
celebrated as the residence of 
certain sages to whom Sauti related the
Mahābhārata; <ls>R. 19. 1</ls>; (the name
is thus derived: --{#yatastu nimizeRedaM nihataM#}
{#dAnavaM balaM . araRye'smiMstatastena#} 
{#nEmizAraRyasaMjYitaM ..#}).
